attributes.action: look into our sons disastrous vasectomy procedure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our son had a vasectomy procedure in october 2007at a GPs surgery the procedure went terribly wrong and our son contracted gangrene. it is government policy to farm out these procedures sureley you should ensure they are carried out in a safe and sterile environment we as parents blame the  government for our sons illness.

rejection.details: Please direct through the NHS complaints procedure channels.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
